## useDestroyable() function

A hook for using a destroyable thing, so when the value changes the previous value is destroyed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useDestroyable<T extends Partial<Destroyable>>(initialValue?: T): [T, (state: T) => any];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  initialValue | T | <i>(Optional)</i> The initial value |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[T, (state: T) =&gt; any\]

The current value as well as a setter for the new value
